channel.title: 562 Client help
channel.description:
Right can someone help me code a 562 or get me a blank client and server... and how do I make it so I don't have to give out the server (source) to anyone to make it work too... I'm willing to give Admin to the person that helps me out in this problem...
Email me dan478@hotmail.co.uk thanks or add me witch ever one is good thanks =]
